price: Wọ́n ń tẹ́tí gbọ́ irọ́, wọ́n sì ń jẹ n̄ǹkan èèwọ̀. Nítorí náà, tí wọ́n bá wá bá ọ, ṣèdájọ́ láààrin wọn tàbí kí o ṣẹ́rí kúrò lọ́dọ̀ wọn. Tí o bá ṣẹ́rí kúrò lọ́dọ̀ wọn, wọn kò lè kó ìnira kan kan bá ọ. Tí o bá sì fẹ́ dájọ́, ṣe ìdájọ́ láààrin wọn pẹ̀lú déédé. Dájúdájú Allāhu nífẹ̀ẹ́ àwọn onídéédé.
arabic: سَمَّٰعُونَ لِلۡكَذِبِ أَكَّٰلُونَ لِلسُّحۡتِۚ فَإِن جَآءُوكَ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡۖ وَإِن تُعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ فَلَن يَضُرُّوكَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَإِنۡ حَكَمۡتَ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُقۡسِطِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: sammāʿūna lil'kadhibi akkālūna lilssuḥ'ti fa-in jāūka fa-uḥ'kum baynahum aw aʿriḍ ʿanhum wa-in tuʿ'riḍ ʿanhum falan yaḍurrūka shayan wa-in ḥakamta fa-uḥ'kum baynahum bil-qis'ṭi inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muq'siṭīna
